name: Billy Bob's Completely Normal Adventure
description:
Billy Bob found this strange little dungeon by his home. What does it hold, I wonder?

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys - Movement
Space - Confirm

A short game made for raylib's 9 year jam.

Sprites by Kenney (@kenney.nl)
SFX made using rFxGen.
Logo made with Aseprite.
Raylib by Ramon Santamaria (@raysan5)
